pullrequest.title: Clamp window size to fit screen

content.raw: or maybe it’s possible to detect if the expansion has happened because the user is dragging it larger \(which you want to support\), vs if the expansion has happened programmatically \(which can be an issue\)? \(these are genuine questions: I don’t know if it’s trivial to detect this\)
content.html: or maybe it’s possible to detect if the expansion has happened because the user is dragging it larger (which you want to support), vs if the expansion has happened programmatically (which can be an issue)? (these are genuine questions: I don’t know if it’s trivial to detect this)
